item.title: Machine Learning in Production
item.description: Working with machine learning is not what it used to be. Let's face it. Now, there is much less time for hacking and much more time for deployment. The situation is not new and certainly not bad at all. That is why you should be prepared for the new roles and positions offered by the market.[5min read]
